articles.title: Trump Tariff Threats Weigh on Asian Risk Appetite: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: European and US stock futures fell and haven assets such as gold rallied after President Donald Trump proposed new levies on eight countries that have opposed his plans to acquire Greenland. The dollar weakened against most of its major peers.
